patthana8.12:1.1: Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokiyo ca nalokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana8.12:2.1: Nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.12:3.1: Nalokiyañca nalokuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (2) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.12:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
